name: Scary Clown Crime Gang Attack
description:
Playing clown robbery games and mask fighting games is very common, but do you have the experience of scary clown killer prank simulation game? I hope not. So get yourself familiar with the city clown scary prank game with most dazzling clown masks and multiple tasks. Perform multiple tasks of scaring people of city hallway and darkcity shadows. Enjoy mask fighting in this very own scary clown city hallway simulation game. Perform clown tactics to scare as many people as you can to become the clown master of city scary clown mafia. Clown mafia in New York is known for their deadly prank and killer attacks. Show deadly attacks in more futuristic form and lead the New York city as deadly prank clown master.

Game Features:

- Real Clown Pranks Simulator
- Scary mission by hiding real face
- Scary masks to perform horror missions
- Realistic clown animations
- Highly addictive & challenging gameplay
- Darkcity shadow mafia fights
- Realistic visual effects
- HD graphics and sound effects
